title: Patricia Lillie
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Patricia Lillie**

Along with producing popular shareware fonts in the 1990s, Patricia designed several dozen typefaces and picture fonts for foundries such as [Image Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Image%20Club), [EyeWire](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/EyeWire), [T.26](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/T.26), and [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC).

Website:

[http://www.patricialillie.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/www.patricialillie.com/ "http://www.patricialillie.com/")

Identifont profile:

[http://www.identifont.com/show?6MP](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235744/http:/www.identifont.com/show?6MP "http://www.identifont.com/show?6MP")
author: Grant Hutchinson
